text: Who is it that will lend God by expending his wealth in the way of God a goodly loan goodly by virtue of his expending it for God’s sake so that He may multiply it fa-yudā‘ifahu may also be read fa-yuda‘‘ifahu for him from tenfold up to more than seven hundredfold —as stated in sūrat al-Baqara Q. 2261 and so that there may be for him in addition to the multiplied reward a generous reward coupled with satisfaction and prosperity.
